title: Your account has been logged into from another computer
body: Hi guys ... I am kinda confused and spooked :/ ... I never shared my acc with anyone and now when I finished game I got this message and tbh I do not like idea of someone else using my ACC and also I jsut recently changed my password :/ and still someone can log on mu acc ?? How is that possible?

replies.body:
Couldn't say how someone could gain access to your account specifically, but I do want to help!  Run through our [account protection guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)here, which will help you secure your info in and outside of League, as well as some general safety tips to live by.  

If you have any concerns or find anything funny about your specific account, hit us up in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as well, and they can help you out!

Hi I have never shared my account informations with anyone. Today I got on my email password change requested but I did not asked for it and if I now try to change password its telling me that my original password, which I got saved by my browser in memory, its incorrect. I am pretty sure someone is trying to gain access to my account also I was not playing for about year or more and in my game history were matches from march of this year and heroes I do not remember buying :(

okay so quick update ... I can't log into game. In launcher when I put in mu password I am getting information that its incorrect password and I played last night. I have no idea what is going on ... PLEASE HELP!!!!

update:

I changed my password again now I am using one of my work passwords. Hopefully that will end this but I am still interested who and where from they try to gain control over my account.

Hey, this is definitely a stressful situation and I highly recommend reaching out to us in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) if you haven't already.  Our account team should be able to assist you directly!
